title: Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area: Multimedia Presentations
body: Multimedia Presentations                         Welcome to Cochran Shoals Great introduction to the most used area of the park.  Duration:5 minutes, 12 seconds                                Intern and Volunteer Orientation (Homestretch, 2013) This video features students from the 2013 Homestretch crew offering tips for new volunteers and interns at Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area.  Duration:9 minutes, 23 seconds                                Summer Splash 2012 Here are a few scenes from the Fifth Annual Summer Splash on Saturday, July 28, 2012! Five hundred and fifty-one paddlers floated from Morgan Falls to Powers Island, many of them first-time visitors. Enjoy!  Duration:2 minutes, 43 seconds                                Chattahoochee River Safety Having a safe day on the Chattahoochee River doesn't just happen, watch this short video and learn how to have a safe float on the river.  Duration:1 minute, 17 seconds                                Happy Holidays from the Chattahoochee River. Happy Holidays from the Chattahoochee River.  Duration:18 seconds
